content: stash everything you need for a fun day at the beach park or anywhere this generously sized tote bag comes to life in shades of red heart super saver stripes watch colors reveal themselves effortlessly as you practice double_crochet granny clusters chain stitch single_crochet assembly and more measuring 14 w x 15 5 h x 10 deep it s sure to become your go-to bag for any daily excursion materials red heart® super saver stripes™ 5 oz/141g 236 yds/215 m parrot stripes 4968 2 balls or 466 yds/426 m measurements approx 14 35 5 cm wide x 15½ 39 5 cm high x 10 25 5 cm deep excluding handles
